title: No device can see my 5GHz WiFi hotspot on Pixel 3 XL
content: For the longest my 5GHz hotspot worked fine but recently it has become suddenly unfindable by devices I used in the past to connect to the hotspot. When I switch to the 2.4GHz band, devices can see the hotspot again but the internet is unbelievably slow to non-existent. Any advice would be greatly appreciated.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
